## type [Hasher](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/security/password/bcrypt.go#L10-L13>)

Hasher hashes and verifies passwords with pepper support

```go
type Hasher struct {
    Cost   int
    Pepper string
}
```

<a name="Hasher.Compare"></a>
### func \(Hasher\) [Compare](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/security/password/bcrypt.go#L29>)

```go
func (h Hasher) Compare(hash string, password string) error
```

Compare verifies that the provided password matches the stored hash

### func \(Hasher\) [Hash](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/security/password/bcrypt.go#L16>)

```go
func (h Hasher) Hash(password string) (string, error)
```

Hash returns the bcrypt hash of the provided password combined with the configured pepper
